text: Bernard Stalter (12 March 1957 - 12 April 2020) was a French businessman and politician. He was born in Brumath, France. Stalter was a member of the Regional Council of Grand Est from 2016 until his death. He was also a member of the French Economic, Social and Environmental Council from 2015 until his death. Stalter died on 12 April 2020 in Strasbourg, France of COVID-19, aged 63.Coronavirus : Bernard Stalter, président de la chambre des métiers d'Alsace et de France, est mort ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in France Category:French businesspeople Category:Politicians from Grand Est Category:People from Bas- Rhin
title: Bernard Stalter
